LanguageData.LuciferiumRain.label: luciferium rain
LanguageData.LuciferiumRain.rulePack.rulesStrings.1: tale_noun->the atmosphere near [PAWN_nameDef]'s [Community] becoming filled with nannites
LanguageData.LuciferiumRain.rulePack.rulesStrings.7: circumstance_phrase->covered by a faint sheen of luminous dust
LanguageData.LuciferiumRain.rulePack.rulesStrings.8: circumstance_phrase->arranged in a pattern that suggests bones
LanguageData.LuciferiumRain.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: circumstance_phrase->waiting for the luciferium rain to stop
LanguageData.LuciferiumRain.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: desc_sentence->[PAWN_nameDef] lies on the ground, [PAWN_possessive] body twisted at an unusual angle.
LanguageData.LuciferiumRain.rulePack.rulesStrings.11: desc_sentence->[PAWN_nameDef] hides near a [TerrainFeature], gazing out with a [AdjectiveAngsty] look.
LanguageData.LuciferiumRain.rulePack.rulesStrings.13: desc_sentence->[PAWN_nameDef] rests quietly with a layer of sweat upon [PAWN_possessive] face.
